title: Celine Dion wishes her twins a happy 9th birthday, shares rare photos of Eddy and Nelson
text:
CLOSE

Celine Dion shared a rare photo of her kids to Instagram. (Photo: ALICE CHICHE, AFP/Getty Images)

Celine Dion is celebrating her youngest kids' 9th birthday by sharing a rare photo of them.

The 51-year-old mother of three posted two photos of her twins, Nelson and Eddy, to Instagram. The siblings are posed back-to-back in one picture and are making silly faces in the next.

"Double the laughter and double the love," Dion captioned the photo. "Happy 9th Birthday, Nelson and Eddy! I’m so very proud of my boys. I love you!"

She also wrote the same message in French.

Dion has three children, the twins and an older son, René-Charles, 18, whom she shared with her late husband, René Angélil. He died in 2016 after battling cancer.

READ MORE

Dion, who celebrated her birthday in April, told USA TODAY that she was looking forward to just spending time with her kids on her special day.

"I said to everybody, a couple of months before: 'Listen to me. I want nothing. No party. Today is my day. I want to be in my pajamas. I want to take as long as I want to sip my coffee. I want to be with my kids,'" she said.

She added that she wasn't celebrating turning 51, but rather that she was turning 1.

"And I decided I am not going to be 51," Dion said. "I’m now (starting over as) 1 year old. So I pushed that chapter of 50 pages behind me. So I’m 1 year old. I’m starting again."

Read or Share this story: https://www.usatoday.com/story/life/parenting/2019/10/24/celine-dion-twins-turn-9-celebrates-rare-photos-instagram/4086161002/
description: Celine Dion's twins turned 9 years old and she publicly wished them a happy birthday by sharing photos to social media.
